faqs.question: Are there any specific legal considerations when purchasing IT office space in Manesar
faqs.answer: Yes purchasers of IT office space must ensure the property is situated within a legally designated IT or ITES zone and holds the necessary approvals from relevant governmental bodies like HUDA or HSIIDC. Specific attention should be paid to the Occupancy Certificate OC and clear title deeds. We strongly advise working with legal counsel who specializes in commercial real estate law in Haryana to ensure full compliance regarding land use regulations floor area ratio FAR and zoning permissions before finalizing the transaction.
